thread.title: This Ballerina Proves That Treadmills Are Anything but Boring
thread.title_full: This Ballerina Proves That Treadmills Are Anything but Boring

author: Hannah McGoldrick
title: This Ballerina Proves That Treadmills Are Anything but Boring
text:
This Ballerina Proves That Treadmills Are Anything but Boring This certainly is one way to cross train. By The Runner's World Editors Tuesday, January 24, 2017, 10:13 am A video posted by KYLIE SHEA (@kyliesheaxo) on Jan 23, 2017 at 6:13am PST 
We’ve seen ballerinas turn to running (just ask our social media editor, Hannah McGoldrick). But after watching Kylie Shea Lewallen, dancer, model, and actress, we’re thinking about trading in our running kicks for some pointe shoes. Advertisement
